16.text:
So, er, freshers week 
 starts...with a bang!

25.text:
Because I banged you. 
 Yeah, I'm with you.

30.text:
I'm sorry about the cramp, 
 by the way. No, it's fine.

33.text: I mean, I was really going for it.

35.text:
My brother says it's 
 all about the pump count.

39.text: I like to hit 100ppm, if possible.

44.text: Pumps per minute. I got it.

52.text:
And, er, do you reckon 
 your flatmates heard?

57.text:
Get in. 
 Should help to get the buzz going.

61.text:
You know, get everyone talking about
 how there's a shagger on campus!

65.text: You can't buy PR like that.

66.text: I could tweet about it, if you want.

72.text:
That is what uni's all about, 
 though, right?

74.text:
You know, getting drunk, 
 getting laid.

77.text:
That's what my brother says, anyway,
 and he'd know. Yeah? Yeah.

82.text:
Totally. I actually had a guy 
 back on Tuesday night. Really?

88.text:
Anything happen? We fooled around. 
 You slept together?!

91.text:
I'll leave you to work out 
 what "fooled around" means!

95.text:
We weren't exactly having 
 pillow fights all night. Oh.

100.text:
Bet we'll have a few more notches 
 on the bedpost by the end of

103.text:
freshers, eh? Yeah, 
 I'll have fuck-all bedpost left!

106.text:
People will start 
 to think I've got woodworm!

108.text:
Yeah, people will think that I've 
 got some sort of...like, um...

112.text:
Plenty of Netflix 
 and chilling ahead.

115.text:
Illegally streaming or chilling 
 more like. I'm not made of money!

120.text:
But, if you ever want to pop over 
 to watch something, that'd be cool.

127.text:
Anyway, better be off. 
 Pub golf tonight. Oh.

131.text:
It's meant to be carnage. 
 Good luck. I'll pray for you. Yeah!

138.text:
But, uh...do drop me a line, 
 if you ever want to chill.

152.text:
Chances are I'll have company. 
 Oh, right.

156.text:
Yeah, I mean, on the first night, 
 I, um, had a threesome, so...

163.text:
Yeah, me, one of the guys from my 
 flat and these two really hot girls.

172.text:
OK, actually, do you know what, 
 Liam? Fuck it, I won't be calling.

176.text: Oh. I'm not looking to shag around.

178.text:
I slept with you because 
 I thought you were cool. Really?

180.text: Yeah, but apparently I was wrong.

182.text:
But you fooled around with 
 someone on Tuesday night!

185.text:
He's my friend, he's gay, we played 
 Mario Kart. I love Mario Kart! Why?

191.text:
Because your brother 
 told you you should?

193.text:
Who, by the way, sounds like an 
 idiot. 100ppm?! That's not a thing.

200.text:
And, look, OK, I haven't 
 had sex that many times,

202.text:
but I've had it enough to know 
 that that was average.

212.text:
I was more in the vicinity... 
 than actually involved...

219.text:
What're you talking about? 
 It was at a house party.

238.text:
Maybe I could hang out here 
 a bit longer?

244.text:
Suppose so. 
 Bit of Netflix and chill.

249.text:
I do actually have Netflix, 
 by the way. Same here.

252.text:
I don't actually agree 
 with illegal streaming.
